hero.heading: Hassle Free Web Development
hero.text: All-in-one place for your web design and development needs.

one.heading: Custom Made Designs
one.text: We tailor every website to your needs and wishes to make your ideas come to life. We can do the whole design and development process for you, to give you more time to focus on other areas of your business.
one.alt: Drawing of a woman designing something.

two.heading: Modern and Responsive Websites
two.text: All our websites are made according to the current web-development standards with responsive design. This means the website will look beautiful on all screens, be it phone, tablet or desktop.
two.alt: Drawing of a woman looking at responsive design.

three.heading: Search Engine Optimized
three.text: Our websites are search engine optimized (SEO), which ensures that they appear and look good in searches on all popular search engines like Google, Bing and DuckDuckGo.
three.alt: Drawing of a woman searching for something.

graphicDesign.title: Graphic Design
text: We can provide you with graphic design services that fit your needs. Depending on where you are in the process we will help you with the next steps to realize your product. We can provide you with mockups, wireframes and/or finished designs, which is all included in our website development service.

The graphic design process will start with a discussion where we find out what ideas you have for the looks of your app. Then we will create a moodboard and wireframe of the app to see if our idea matches yours, if that is the case we will create the finished design. When the design is fully approved by you, we move on to development.
graphicDesign.alt: Drawing of a woman watching a piece of art

development.title: Development
text: We tailor every website after the your needs. This means we start from scratch and develop the website step by step according to the design agreed upon with you. With this approach we make sure we create exactly the product you want and that it always works as you expect.

When we design websites we make sure to always follow the current best practices and use modern technologies to make sure your website is up-to-date and presents your product and ideas in the best possible way.
development.alt: Drawing of a woman holding a cellphone with code on the screen

seo.title: SEO
text: Our websites are created with Search Engine Optimization (SEO) in mind. This means that they will be indexed by the search bots and show up in search engines like Google and Bing with a nice title and good description. We will also make sure all subpages show up in search engines if they are relevant.

To make sure your website looks pleasing when shared with others we will also make sure the appropriate code is in place to make website links automatically populate with a description and photo when linked on platforms like Facebook.
seo.alt: Drawing of a woman looking at some documents with a magnifying glass

cms.title: CMS
text: If you need to be able to change the content of your website often (i.e. blogs, galleries, news, etc.) we can set up a content management system called 'Strapi' for you. This means you will be able to log in to an admin dashboard where you can upload photos or update posts directly to your website.

We will take care of setting up everything and doing the integration between the systems, so that for you the system just works. We will also provide a walkthrough of the CMS system to make sure you are comfortable with using it for your website.
cms.alt: Drawing of a woman looking at two images

techConsulting.title: Tech Consulting
text: Our main focus is web development, but we can also be of service in other aspects of the tech world if needed. We have experience in app development (both mobile and desktop), dockerization, Robot Process Automation (RPA), IT infrastructure, and IT architecture to name a few.
If you or your company are in need of consulting for a project, please contact us and together we will have a look at the issue and see if we can help.
techConsulting.alt: Drawing of a man and a woman carrying some tech stuff

hosting.title: Hosting
text: We host all our websites ourselves in the cloud (Digitalocean), which means they are always available, and accessable quickly from all over the world. If your audience is in a spesific part of the world, we can host your website in a cloud server that is located close to that location to keep the latency as low as possible.

If you want to have your website hosted with another provider (AWS, Azure, Vercel, etc.) we will be able to help you set that up if required. If you just want the code and want someone else to do the hosting, we will transfer the finished codebase to you after the project is done, so that you can mange the hosting yourself.
hosting.alt: Drawing of a woman looking at some servers

company.title: The Company
text: Maas Media was founded in 2022 by Asgeir who is a professional full-stack developer and web designer with a vision to help people and businesses establish a strong online presence for their businesses, hobbies and other passion projects.

We are located in Surnadal which is a small town in the middle of Norway, but takes on jobs from all over the world. Our developers work full-time jobs during the daytime, so the work for Maas Media happens in the afternoon and on weekends when they are not otherwise engaged.
company.alt: Drawing of a man looking at a map of the earth with a dot on Norway.

tech.title: The Tech
text: We design and develop all our client websites from scratch using industry standard tools and tech. The design process is done in cooperation with the client using Figma, then the website is developed using Svelte. If the client has any special requirements for the framework we are also able to develop the website in React or Vuejs.

If a backend is required, we usually use Strapi, and everything is then hosted in the cloud on Digitalocean, unless the client wants to self-host. If that is the case then we transfer over the codebase to the client so they can host it wherever they prefer.
tech.alt: Drawing of a man sitting at a computer, coding a website.

faq.title: FAQ

questions.question: How much does a website cost?
questions.answer: This depends entirely on the complexity of the website you want. Simpler websites start at around â‚¬400 while more complex websites will be more expensive. Contact us and we can discuss your idea and figure out a good price.

questions.question: How long does the design phase take?
questions.answer: The design phase usually takes about a week, but might take longer if the scope of the project is big or requires complex design. Contact us and we can discuss your idea and we will give you a time estimate for the project.

questions.question: How long does development take?
questions.answer: Development usually takes about a week, but like the design phase, this also depends on the scope and complexity of the project. Contact us and we can discuss your idea and we will give you a time estimate for the project.

questions.question: Can I host the websites you make myself?
questions.answer: Yes. If you don't want us to do the hosting, we can send you all the source code for your website so that you can choose your own hosting provider.

faq.alt: Drawing of a man holding boxes with questions in them.
